name: Blackjack
description: A browser based blackjack game that utilizes HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Good Games
description: Good Games is a MERN stack website dedicated to playing games right in your browser. These games were built using react.

name: Fumblr
description: Fumblr is a full-stack MEN app collaborative project between myself and 2 others, where we made a Tumblr copycat to pay homage to the older version of it.

name: Wayfarer
description: Wayfarer is a mock traveling blog where users can post about various cities they have been to. This project was also a 3-person collaboration, utilizing Django and Python.
